## Interactive visualization

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE, fig.height=7, fig.width = 5, eval = require('networkD3')}

#Render your D3.js network
netd3 <- forceNetwork(
  Links = nd3$links, 
  Nodes = nd3$nodes, 
  Source = "source", 
  Target = "target", 
  NodeID = "name",
  Group = "group",  
  legend = TRUE, 
  fontSize = 20,
  opacity = .8
)

netd3

```
